# FalconPy Project Documentation
Where can I find help?

+ [falconpy.io](#falconpyio)
+ [Repository wiki](#repository-wiki)
+ [Docstrings](#docstrings)
+ [Forums](#discussion-forums)
+ [Issues](#issues)

## falconpy.io
Our primary documentation resource is located at [**falconpy.io**](https://falconpy.io). This website contains usage details for all classes, a complete listing of all service collections
and API operations with code samples for each operation, and is searchable.

[![falconpy.io](https://img.shields.io/badge/-falconpy.io-maroon?logo=data:image/png;base64,&style=for-the-badge&labelColor=black)](https://falconpy.io)


## Repository wiki
The [wiki](https://github.com/CrowdStrike/falconpy/wiki) for this repository also maintains an exact replica of the content maintained on [falconpy.io](https://falconpy.io).

[![FalconPy Wiki](https://img.shields.io/badge/-FalconPy%20Wiki-brown?logo=github&style=for-the-badge&labelColor=black)](https://github.com/CrowdStrike/falconpy/wiki)

## Docstrings
Service Classes provide internal documentation for available API operations within their docstrings.
You can use the built-in Python `help` method to retrieve this documentation if it is not available within your IDE.

```python
from falconpy import Hosts

help(Hosts)
```

## Discussion forums
Our community maintains a discussion board for interacting about FalconPy usage and for handling questions.  This content is labeled by API and fully searchable.
Check there to see if someone else hasn't encountered the issue you are having. If they haven't, please submit your question to the community. We want to help!


[![Discussions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CrowdStrike/falconpy/main/docs/asset/ask-a-question.png)](https://github.com/CrowdStrike/falconpy/discussions?discussions_q=category%3AQ%26A)

## Issues
Think perhaps the error you're receiving is a [bug](https://github.com/CrowdStrike/falconpy/issues?q=is%3Aissue+label%3A%22bug+%3Abug%3A%22+) within FalconPy? 

Have you found a piece of documentation that is [incorrect](https://github.com/CrowdStrike/falconpy/issues?q=is%3Aissue+label%3A%22documentation+%3Abook%3A%22), pointing to a [broken link](https://github.com/CrowdStrike/falconpy/issues?q=is%3Aissue+label%3A%22broken+link+%3Alink%3A%22) or [missing](https://github.com/CrowdStrike/falconpy/issues?q=is%3Aissue+label%3A%22documentation+%3Abook%3A%22)?

Please let us know by [submitting an issue](https://github.com/CrowdStrike/falconpy/issues/new/choose)!

[![Report Issue](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CrowdStrike/falconpy/main/docs/asset/report-issue.png)](https://github.com/CrowdStrike/falconpy/issues/new/choose)
